Posts.Content: mommcat wrote: Hi I was just diagnosed this a.m. with breast cancer and am reeling.  I want this thing out yesterday!  My breast surgeon can do my surgery as soon as Friday, but the plastic surgeons she works with are not available until September.  I'm not willing to wait that long.  Does anyone know of a really good breast surgeon and plastic surgeon in the Los Angeles area?  Thanks so much for your help.  Dx 7/24/2010, IDC, 1cm, Stage I, Grade 2, 0/14 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: NEED RECOMMENDATION FOR SURGEON mommcat dlb823
